Subject: Policy not working
Description:
Hi Team,

I have created policy to restrict copy-pasting source code on certain websites, such as online code comparison tools, code compilers, or copying data into Gmail. This policy is aligned with our DLP settings.

But this policy is not working.

Regards,
Harsh
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c:
Create a block and report policy with Anydesk selected as exit point, select in the denylist MS Office file types, and some source codes.
Select ONLY the user in the CAP policy.
What_We_Know__c:
The customer was trying to achieve the operation of blocking MS Office files via Anydesk.
After we've selected the computer in the CAP policy, the policy worked as intended.
Confirmed by the customer that the ticket can be closed.
Next_Steps__c: Connect with the customer and investigate further.
Solution_Comment__c:
The customer was trying to achieve the operation of blocking MS Office files via Anydesk.
After we've selected the computer in the CAP policy, the policy worked as intended.
